"Ugly girls are like prime numbers - nothing will go into them except themselves."
"@Ricky_Vaughn99 About time the Protestants start to see the lie that Islam is."
"The most fake thing I have ever seen is watching two girls meet each other for the first time."
"Some relationships are like fat people\nThey don't work out."
"I hate when kids spill their whole cup of yogurt when getting toppings but honestly it's worth it to hear the Latino parents get livid. "
"You can't call yourself a Christian but call your friends faggots. You can't choose when you're religious. You either are or you aren't."
"Is it rape if you make her orgasm?"
